channel.title: Comments on: BGG.con
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Jeff
item.dc:creator: Jeff
item.description:
My mistake... It actually says DREAMPUNKPR. My brain must have interpreted the second to last letter as an "E" instead of an "P" when I read it.
I did receive the confirmation email after I made the purchase. So I think I'm good.
item.content:encoded:
My mistake… It actually says DREAMPUNKPR. My brain must have interpreted the second to last letter as an “E” instead of an “P” when I read it.

I did receive the confirmation email after I made the purchase. So I think I’m good.

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: Did it really say DREAMPUNKER on it? Did you receive the purchase confirmation email when you first bought it online?
item.content:encoded: Did it really say DREAMPUNKER on it? Did you receive the purchase confirmation email when you first bought it online?

item.title: By: Jeff
item.dc:creator: Jeff
item.description:
Sounds like you had a lot of fun. Over and above that, I'm glad that you were able to sell so many copies.
I received my credit card statement and saw the DREAMPUNKER charge on it. This was a big relief because I was a little worried about using PayPal (1st time for me). Maybe this In-tar-net thing will stick around after all? ;)
item.content:encoded:
Sounds like you had a lot of fun. Over and above that, I’m glad that you were able to sell so many copies.

I received my credit card statement and saw the DREAMPUNKER charge on it. This was a big relief because I was a little worried about using PayPal (1st time for me). Maybe this In-tar-net thing will stick around after all? ðŸ˜‰

item.title: By: Jen
item.dc:creator: Jen
item.description: Yay! I already have my copy. I suppose it helps to be local though. :)
item.content:encoded: Yay! I already have my copy. I suppose it helps to be local though. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: All of the games are being delivered today to the storage facility. I'm just waiting on the mailing boxes from the post office. I should start filling orders in a week or so!
item.content:encoded: All of the games are being delivered today to the storage facility. I’m just waiting on the mailing boxes from the post office. I should start filling orders in a week or so!

item.title: By: Echo
item.dc:creator: Echo
item.description:
Hooray for the success of House of Whack! I'm so pleased to hear that it was well received.
We preordered one. Are you filling the online preorders yet?
item.content:encoded:
Hooray for the success of House of Whack! I’m so pleased to hear that it was well received.

We preordered one. Are you filling the online preorders yet?
